unit_learning_outcomes.description: Employ a wide range of engineering project management techniques and tools needed for successful project implementation. Identify any issues in engineering project management practices and provide solutions that enable successful completion of the project according to stakeholders' requirements
Describe the management fundamentals with regard to consulting engineering practice and management
Demonstrate the ability to think critically, to solve problem, and to work in team
Explore current practices and modern trends in project management

assessments.description: An essay on given topics in engineering project implementation practices.

data.unit_offering_text:
Session 1, Weekday attendance, North Ryde
Session 1, Special circumstances
data.description: This unit provides students with advanced knowledge and skills needed to successfully deliver a project. The subject matter covered is suitable for a broad range of engineering disciplines with an emphasis on building advanced skills in engineering project management. This is a core unit for the Master of Engineering Management program that delivers coherent learning skills with other units that can help students with advanced knowledge for effective leadership and management in engineering projects.
data.title: Engineering Project Implementation
